description.value:
Trigger A living creature examines the mural or enters the room

Effect The haunt activates and rolls initiative.

The faintly moving images compel one creature within 30 feet of the room to move into the room. The creature attempts a @Check[type:will|dc:38|traits:charm] save.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target must spend all its actions on its next turn moving into the room, and is then @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Paralyzed] until the end of its next turn.

Critical Failure As failure, and the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2} for 1 minute.

The haunt causes a living creature in the room to experience a full elven life, weathering every wound, misfortune, loss, and consequence of aging centuries in a matter of seconds. The target must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:38] save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fatigued].

Failure The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 1} (or its drained value increases by 1, to a maximum of drained 3), and it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Paralyzed] until the end of its next turn.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Doomed]{Doomed 1} (or its doomed value increases by 1).

hp.details: per square (6 squares must be destroyed to disable the haunt)

details.description: A haunted mural fascinates characters and swiftly drains their vitality.
details.disable: @Check[type:occultism|dc:38|name:Calm the Restless Energies|traits:haunt,magical] (master) or @Check[type:religion|dc:38|name:Calm the Restless Energies|traits:haunt,magical] (master) to calm the restless energies and suppress the haunt for 1 hour; a critical success deactivates the haunt permanently.
details.reset: The haunt continues its routine until there are no targets within 30 feet of the room. It then resets over the course of 1 minute and is able to activate again.
details.routine: (2 actions) The haunt lures creatures into area A2 using Captivate. Any actions it hasn't used to Captivate are used to drain a living creature in the room with Live a Thousand Lives.
